text:
[Verse]
Midnight on the rooftop
Stars all shining bright
Music through the skylight
Come let's dance tonight

[Verse 2]
Feet on the cool tiles
Hearts begin to race
Laughing in the moonlight
Lost in our own space

[Chorus]
We'll dance under the stars
In each other's arms
Spinning through the dark
Hearts playing their parts

[Verse 3]
Shadows do a tango
Wind sings through the night
Our love's like a rainbow
Colors burning bright

[Chorus]
We'll dance under the stars
In each other's arms
Spinning through the dark
Hearts playing their parts

[Bridge]
Moonlight paints the skyline
Whispers in the air
Moving to the rhythm
Losing all our cares
title: Moonlit Dance
